metadata.title: CVE-2023-51796 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in Ffmpeg v.N113007-g8d24a28d06 allows alocal attacker to execute arbitrary code via thelibavfilter/f_reverse.c:269:26 in areverse_request_frame.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
